projects.name: Buildwise
projects.details: Developed an integrated construction project management system featuring automated BOQ generation, quotation processes, and centralized database management. (System Analysis and Design coursework)

projects.name: Badbuddy
projects.details: Developed BadBuddy, a web application that facilitates organizing badminton meetups by allowing users to create events, invite participants, and manage badminton court bookings. (Software Design and Development coursework)

technologies.details: JavaScript, Typescript, Java, Python, C, CPP, Node.js, Go
ReactJS, NextJS, NuxtJS, Astro, NestJS, SvelteJS, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Spring Boot, Go Fiber
Firebase, Vercel, Github Actions, CircleCI, CloudFlare

details: Designed and developed a video management website, Implemented new features and functionalities
Developed and maintained automated UI tests using Jest
Collaborated with the team to resolve technical challenges and enhance user interface discussions.
Designed and developed a website to address university-wide issues and manage activities during various festivals.
Created UX/UI designs for the website to ensure an intuitive and user-friendly experience.
Ensured high-quality software delivery by implementing robust quality control measures before production launches.
Collaborated with the university's hackathon coordination team to streamline event management and problem-solving processes.
Provided end-to-end custom website development services based on client requirements

interests: Music : EDM, Synth, Rock, Dance, Electronic, Lofi
